QuestData.Title: A Strike at the Heart
QuestData.Description: These pits have long been a blight upon the lives of our new allies. The demons hunt them down and torture the poor souls for sport.$B$B<Turalyon shakes his head with disgust, fixing his gaze upon the beast before him.>$B$BIt is time to make them pay for their cruelty and restore hope to this Light-forsaken place.$b$bWe strike on your mark, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: This victory is only the first link in a long chain, $ct.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Turalyon to begin the fight
